last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter Thirty-Six: At The Mountains Of Madness
last_episode_to_air.overview: The darkest days of the void arrive as Sabrina struggles with grief and regret. Can she summon the strength to overcome an endless cycle of destruction?

name: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
overview: As her 16th birthday nears, Sabrina must choose between the witch world of her family and the human world of her friends. Based on the Archie comic.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: All hail the queen. Chilling Adventures of Sabrina returns for Part 3 January 24, only on Netflix.

tagline: High School is such a witch.

episodes.name: Chapter One: October Country
episodes.overview: While Greendale readies for a Halloween eclipse, Sabrina faces a crucial decision and Harvey makes and unexpected declaration.

episodes.name: Chapter Two: The Dark Baptism
episodes.overview: A legendary guest visits Spellman Mortuary. Ambrose explores a grim revelation, and Sabrina stuns the coven with a shocking announcement.

episodes.name: Chapter Three: The Trial of Sabrina Spellman
episodes.overview: As Sabrina confronts a long line of family secrets, Harvey faces turmoil at home - and shares a secret of his own.

episodes.name: Chapter Four: Witch Academy
episodes.overview: Sabrina takes a weekend trip. Father Blackwood poses a pivotal question. Roz and Susie stage an impromptu -- and unnerving -- sleepover.

episodes.name: Chapter Five: Dreams in a Witch House
episodes.overview: A mysterious demon wreaks havoc on Spellman Mortuary. Sabrina goes rogue and puts her powers to the test.

episodes.name: Chapter Six: An Exorcism in Greendale
episodes.overview: Harvey, Roz and Susie explore a mysterious force of evil. Sabrina digs deeper into Ms. Wardwell's intentions. Hilda pursues a new beginning.

episodes.name: Chapter Seven: Feast of Feasts
episodes.overview: The coven prepares for an annual ritual as Harvey takes part in a Kinkle family tradition. Sabrina grows suspicious of Lady Blackwood.

episodes.name: Chapter Eight: The Burial
episodes.overview: A disaster rattles the Greendale community. Desperate to help, Sabrina attempts a new kind of dark magic -- with the assistance of an unusual ally.

episodes.name: Chapter Nine: The Returned Man
episodes.overview: Sabrina recruits Roz for a crucial mission. Susie reconnects with her past. Lord Blackwood challenges Aunt Zela's authority.

episodes.name: Chapter Ten: The Witching Hour
episodes.overview: A revolutionary attack divides the witches and mortals of Greendale, and Sabrina braces for a life-changing choice.

episodes.name: Chapter Eleven: A Midwinter's Tale
episodes.overview: During the Church of Night's celebration of the winter solstice, on the longest night of the year, families gather around the Yule fire to sing pagan carols and tell ghost stories. The holidays are also a time for guests and visitors  both welcome and unwelcome  and you never know who'll drop down the chimney.

episodes.name: Chapter Twelve: The Epiphany
episodes.overview: As Sabrina prepares for a spellbinding showcase, Susie embraces a series of new beginnings, and Ms. Wardwell finds greater purpose at Baxter High.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirteen: The Passion of Sabrina Spellman
episodes.overview: A sinister guest visits Spellman Mortuary. Theo faces a cast of cruel critics, and Roz and Harvey pursue an extra-steamy school assignment.

episodes.name: Chapter Fourteen: Lupercalia
episodes.overview: Love and lust sweep through Greendale as Harvey surprises Roz with a sweet gift, and Sabrina explores a romantic ritual ... and her feelings for Nick.

episodes.name: Chapter Fifteen: Doctor Cerberus's House of Horror
episodes.overview: Sabrina, Theo, Roz and others attempt to navigate the lines between fact, fiction and fate when a mysterious stranger sets up shop in Cerberus Books.

episodes.name: Chapter Sixteen: Blackwood
episodes.overview: Tensions rise as Zelda and Father Blackwood's union draws near. Amid the chaos, Sabrina greets a familiar vision and Ambrose uncovers a dark truth.

episodes.name: Chapter Seventeen: The Missionaries
episodes.overview: As Hilda and Sabrina attempt to save Ambrose, Ms. Wardwell considers a crucial move, and a violent group of witch hunters targets the Church of Night.

episodes.name: Chapter Eighteen: The Miracles of Sabrina Spellman
episodes.overview: On the heels of a most perplexing spectacle, Sabrina dives deeper into her newfound power, and Zelda slips into the role of Lady Blackwood.

episodes.name: Chapter Nineteen: The Mandrake
episodes.overview: An ominous discovery leads to a desperate search for answers -- and a risky spell for Sabrina. Meanwhile, Father Blackwood makes a bold announcement.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty: The Mephisto Waltz
episodes.overview: Light and night cross paths once more as Greendale faces the Dark Lord's prophecy and Prudence challenges Father Blackwood's ruthless plan.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-One: The Hellbound Heart
episodes.overview: Sabrina recruits Roz, Harvey and Theo for an emotional mission. Prudence and Ambrose travel to New Orleans. Ms. Wardwell returns to Baxter High.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Two: Drag Me to Hell
episodes.overview: In Greendale, Sabrina explores a new hobby ... and a disturbing duty. Elsewhere, Prudence and Ambrose continue their search for Father Blackwood.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Three: Heavy Is the Crown
episodes.overview: Sabrina visits a mysterious (and familiar) town. Zelda aims to restore order at the academy. A carnival creates buzz in Greendale. Theo takes a chance.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Four: The Hare Moon
episodes.overview: The coven celebrates a festive tradition -- and crosses paths with unexpected guests. Nick struggles to strike a balance between pleasure and pain.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Five: The Devil Within
episodes.overview: Ambrose treats Nick's affliction while Harvey and Theo tend to Roz. Meanwhile, Sabrina and Caliban continue in their unholy regalia challenge.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Six: All of Them Witches
episodes.overview: Zelda attempts to forge a supernatural alliance, Sabrina and the gang work with Caliban, and Hilda's transformation takes a terrifying turn.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Seven: The Judas Kiss
episodes.overview: On the heels of tragedy, the Spellmans receive a grim omen. Blackwood seeks vengeance. Sabrina prepares for her final challenge against Caliban.

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Eight: Sabrina Is Legend
episodes.overview: The lines between past, present and future blur as Sabrina stages an act of heroic restoration. But will her powers prove to be enough?

episodes.name: Chapter Twenty-Nine: The Eldritch Dark
episodes.overview: As an all-consuming darkness trickles into town, Sabrina grapples with feeling like the odd witch out  and makes a risky plan for a whirlwind trip.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: A grim visitor sends Roz and Harvey into a panic. Elsewhere, Sabrina reconnects with an enemy from her past, and Aunt Hilda's wedding day arrives.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-One: The Weird
episodes.overview: The next terror graces Greendale. Sabrina bonds with a new classmate and finds herself in a squeamish predicament. Roz uncovers a shocking truth.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-Two: The Imp Of The Perverse
episodes.overview: Panic turns political as Sabrina and Roz run for Baxter High co-presidents. Harvey struggles with Roz's reveal. Blackwood takes control of the terror.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-Three: Deus Ex Machina
episodes.overview: Sabrina encounters a surprise at school  and faces a pivotal decision. Theo explores the perks and pitfalls of Robin's time in the mortal world.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-Four: The Returned
episodes.overview: As Sabrina longs for a piece of her past, vengeful visitors return to Greendale. The Fright Club competes in a life-or-death battle of the bands.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-Five: The Endless
episodes.overview: In an alternate universe, Sabrina Morningstar meets a cast of familiar faces  and investigates the thin line between fact and fiction.

episodes.name: Chapter Thirty-Six: At The Mountains Of Madness
episodes.overview: The darkest days of the void arrive as Sabrina struggles with grief and regret. Can she summon the strength to overcome an endless cycle of destruction?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: All hail the queen. Chilling Adventures of Sabrina returns for Part 3 January 24, only on Netflix.
